timezone: The timezone for localizing dates and times in the application. This is an IANA timezone identifier (e.g. America/New_York). If null, dates and times are localized to the user's local timezone.
cache_ttl: The time-to-live (TTL) for data cached at the edge, in milliseconds.
config_db_host: The Postgres host for the configuration database.
config_db_port: The Postgres port for the configuration database.
config_db_name: The Postgres database name for the configuration database.
config_db_user: The Postgres user for the configuration database.
config_db_password: The Postgres password for the configuration database.
short_app_name: A short name for the app when installed as a PWA.
use_custom_icon: Whether to use a custom app icon instead of the default icon.
icon_name: The asset name of the app icon.
icon_type: The IANA media type of the app icon.
icon_padded_name: The asset name of the app icon (padded).
icon_padded_type: The IANA media type of the app icon (padded).
icon_maskable_name: The asset name of the app icon (maskable).
icon_maskable_type: The IANA media type of the app icon (maskable).
icon_monochrome_name: The asset name of the app icon (monochrome).
icon_monochrome_type: The IANA media type of the app icon (monochrome).
icon_monochrome_maskable_name: The asset name of the app icon (monochrome, maskable).
icon_monochrome_maskable_type: The IANA media type of the app icon (monochrome, maskable).
icon_alt: Alt text for the app icon.
